skills.name: Polar Storm
skills.description: [SP: 20][CD: 20s] Generates an iceball that drags away all enemies in its path. The iceball then explodes, freezing enemies within a large AOE and dealing 850 Ice DMG every 0.9s for 4.00s.

skills.name: Coldarra
skills.description: When basic attack (including combo and charged attacks) breaks a shield, unleash a frosty blast, slowing Move Speed and Attack Speed of the target and nearby enemies in a small AOE by 84% for 4.00s.
